LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Combatant.title: Annelitrice Yorha Combatant
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Combatant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha combatant, a well-trained and determined warrior.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_FrontlineOfficer.title: Annelitrice Yorha Frontline Officer
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_FrontlineOfficer.baseDescri: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha frontline officer, responsible for building fortifications.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Scout.title: Annelitrice Yorha Scout
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Scout.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha scout, eyes and ears on the field.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Logistics_Officer.title: Annelitrice Yorha Logistics Officer
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Logistics_Officer.baseDescr: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha logistics officer. Her duty is confidential, because everyone pretends foods are not needed.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Commander.title: Annelitrice Yorha Commander
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Commander.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha commander. She does not spend much time on trivia.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Deserter.title: Annelitrice Yorha Deserter
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Deserter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha deserter. She has some questions about the goal of this organization.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Executioner.title: Annelitrice Yorha Executioner
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Executioner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha executioner. She takes care of the ones who ask too many questions.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Hacker.title: Annelitrice Yorha Hacker
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Hacker.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha hacker. She provides intelligence support for operations.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Healer.title: Annelitrice Yorha Healer
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Healer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha healer, "reparing" the wounds.
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Operator.title: Annelitrice Yorha Operator
LanguageData.Anneli_Yorha_Operator.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Yorha operator, not designed for combat.
